DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Disease or Disorder Assessment Interpretation Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded response used as an explanation of a final result of an examination used to determine whether any abnormal condition of the body that was directly observed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Disease or Disorder Assessment Interpretation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._An act or process of elucidation, explication, or explanation of the meaning of an event or thing.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: An act or process of elucidation; explication, or explanation of the meaning of the event or thing via the assignment of objects from the domain to the constants of a formal language, truth-values to the proposition symbols, truth-functions to the connectives, other functions to the function symbols, and extensions to the predicates, if any. The assignments are result of human logic application and are not native to the symbols of the formal language. Examples of interpretation include rendering by the psychotherapist the latent or hidden meaning of what the patient says, does, or experiences in understandable to him format; the conception of another's behavior; the establishment of significance of something; the result of EKG tracing reading.

Concepts.definition: An act or process of elucidation, explication, or explanation of the meaning of an event or thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.: Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Believed likely.: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Concepts.definition: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Leaving no doubt; not open to question.: An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.: Having been established or verified.: Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.: A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.

Concepts.definition: Leaving no doubt; not open to question.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Refers to abnormal cell activity manifested by decreased control over growth and function, causing tumor growth or spread into surrounding tissue and adverse effects to the host.
A localized pathological or traumatic structural change, damage, deformity, or discontinuity of tissue, organ, or body part.
